availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Alexandria, Kentucky, student. Native of Oldenburg, Germany. Son of Mary Sandfoss Jung. Student in Kenton County in 1860. Resident of Kenton County in 1862.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton, District 1, p. 324.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Campbell County, Alexandria, p. 124B.
_ Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989_, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Campbell County Will Books, Vol D-E, 1878-1926; (Accessed through ancestry.com on January 22, 2020), pp.370-71.
KYR-0001-004-1394.
